Package org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.callbackhandlers

Interface RestAuthCallbackHandler<T extends Callback>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - A class which implements the Callback interface.
    All Superinterfaces:
    JsonCallbackParser<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRestAuthCallbackHandler, RestAuthChoiceCallbackHandler, RestAuthConfirmationCallbackHandler, RestAuthHiddenValueCallbackHandler, RestAuthHttpCallbackHandler, RestAuthLanguageCallbackHandler, RestAuthNameCallbackHandler, RestAuthNameValueOutputCallbackHandler, RestAuthPasswordCallbackHandler, RestAuthPollingWaitCallbackHandler, RestAuthRedirectCallbackHandler, RestAuthTextInputCallbackHandler, RestAuthTextOutputCallbackHandler, RestAuthX509CallbackHandler
    public interface RestAuthCallbackHandler<T extends Callback>
extends JsonCallbackParser<T>
    Implementations of this interface define how to update a Callback from the headers and request of a Rest call, if possible, and the methods defined in JsonCallbackParser.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • Methods inherited from interface org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.callbackhandlers.JsonCallbackParser

        convertFromJson, convertToJson, getCallbackClassName

    • Method Detail

      • updateCallbackFromRequest

        boolean updateCallbackFromRequest​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                  jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                  T callback)
                           throws RestAuthException
        Uses the headers and request contents to update the Callback. If the Callback cannot be completed from the headers and request or the headers and request do not contain the required information the method MUST return false. This is for "zero page login" where the request contains all the required information to authenticate successfully. In this case no callbacks will be sent back to the client, only the success or failure of the authentication.
        Parameters:
        request - The HttpServletRequest from the request.
        response - The HttpServletResponse for the request.
        callback - The Callback to update with its required values from the headers and request.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the Callback was successfully updated. client.
        Throws:
        RestAuthException

      • handle

        T handle​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
         jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
         org.forgerock.json.JsonValue postBody,
         T originalCallback)
        Handles the processing of the JSON given in the request and updates the Callback objects from it. This is for special circumstances where the JSON from the request does not contain a "callback" attribute, where the handleJsonCallbacks() method should be used.
        Parameters:
        request - The HttpServletRequest from the request.
        response - The HttpServletResponse for the request.
        postBody - The POST body from the request.
        originalCallback - The original Callbacks to update.
        Returns:
        The updated originalCallbacks.
